de.unlixx.runpng.util

Class MenuTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.util.MenuTool

  • public class MenuTool
extends java.lang.Object
    MenuTool creates menubars, menus, contextmenus and toolbars from XML resources and icons.

      • createMenuItem

        public javafx.scene.control.MenuItem createMenuItem(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                                    javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction)
        Creates a single menu item from information in the given element.
        Parameters:
        element - An Element object containing information about the menu item to create.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a menu item action.
        Returns:
        A MenuItem object.

      • createMenu

        public javafx.scene.control.Menu createMenu(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                            javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction,
                                            javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event> handlerValidation)
        Creates a whole menu from information in the given element.
        Parameters:
        element - An Element object containing information about the menu to create.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a menu item action. This will be passed to the menu items to create.
        handlerValidation - An EventHandler to invoke in case of menu validation.
        Returns:
        A Menu object.

      • createContextMenu

        public javafx.scene.control.ContextMenu createContextMenu(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                                          javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction,
                                                          javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event> handlerValidation)
        Creates a whole context menu from information in the given JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        element - An Element object containing information about the menu to create.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a menu item action. This will be passed to the menu items to create.
        handlerValidation - An EventHandler to invoke in case of context menu validation.
        Returns:
        A ContextMenu object.

      • readContextMenu

        public javafx.scene.control.ContextMenu readContextMenu(java.lang.String strResName,
                                                        java.lang.String strSection,
                                                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction,
                                                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event> handlerValidation)
        Creates a context menu from XML file.
        Parameters:
        strResName - A string containing the name of the resource file.
        strSection - A string containing the name of the section in the file.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a menu item action. This will be passed to the menu items to create.
        handlerValidation - An EventHandler to invoke in case of context menu validation.
        Returns:
        A ContextMenu object.

      • readMenuBar

        public void readMenuBar(javafx.scene.control.MenuBar menubar,
                        java.lang.String strResName,
                        java.lang.String strSection,
                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction,
                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event> handlerValidation)
        Creates a menu bar from XML file.
        Parameters:
        menubar - A MenuBar object to augment.
        strResName - A string containing the name of the resource file.
        strSection - A string containing the name of the section in the file.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a menu item action. This will be passed to the menu items to create.
        handlerValidation - An EventHandler to invoke in case of context menu validation.

      • createImageToggleButton

        public javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton createImageToggleButton(java.lang.String strId,
                                                                 java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                                 java.lang.String strImagePath)
        Creates a toggle button with an image for use in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        strId - The id string of this button.
        strTooltipId - The tooltip id string.
        strImagePath - The path string to an image icon. This path string will be appended to the central resource path.
        Returns:
        A ToggleButton object with image.

      • createImageButton

        public javafx.scene.control.Button createImageButton(java.lang.String strId,
                                                     java.lang.String strTooltipId,
                                                     java.lang.String strImagePath)
        Creates a button with an image for use in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        strId - The id string of this button.
        strTooltipId - The tooltip id string.
        strImagePath - The path string to an image icon. This path string will be appended to the central resource path.
        Returns:
        A Button object with image.

        public javafx.scene.Node createToolBarItem(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                           javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction)
        Creates a toolbar item from information in the given dom element.
        Parameters:
        element - An Element object containing information about the toolbar item to create.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a toolbar item action.
        Returns:
        A Node object.

      • readToolBar

        public void readToolBar(javafx.scene.control.ToolBar toolbar,
                        java.lang.String strResName,
                        java.lang.String strSection,
                        javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> handlerAction)
        Creates a tool bar from XML file.
        Parameters:
        toolbar - A ToolBar object to augment.
        strResName - A string containing the name of the resource file.
        strSection - A string containing the name of the section in the file.
        handlerAction - An EventHandler to invoke in case of a menu item action. This will be passed to the menu items to create.

        Opens an XML document in the resources directory.
        Parameters:
        strResName - A String containing the name of the resourcefile ("xyz.xml").
        Returns:
        A Document object.
